hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"No man who weeps for fear of Allah will be touched by the Fire until the milk goes back into the udders. And the dust (of Jihad) in the cause of Allah and the smoke of Hell, will never be combined in the nostrils of a Muslim

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَنْ عَمِلَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ عَلَى قَدَمِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The One Who Strives In The Cause Of Allah On His Feet
